name: Scream of the Viking 2
description: Scream of the Viking 2 - is the second part of the story about the Viking. In the second part, you will see new even more dangerous and complex obstacles, traps and enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 1.2 Ghz + Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 5.2 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard\Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 550 MB available space
